name: Two Worlds (itch) (solo-game dev)
description:
Game Made for BYOG Game Jam... (48 Hour)

Theme- Two View and Reset

Press X to Change the View

Press R to Restart the Game

Game Designed and Developed By-Mohammad Nur (Solo Game Dev)

Artwork By- Humza, Danil and Asa

Free Music By- Scirra

Game Made in Construct 3

Some small Graphical Asset from- gamedevmarket.net

Thank You...
